overview: Prakash Mishra is a co-founder of Offerpop and has a diverse background as a technologist, entrepreneur, and investor. He was previously co-founder of Hashwork, an enterprise social networking service; CEO of Spoken Hub, a grassroots political consulting firm; Operating Partner at Connect Capital, an early stage VC affiliated with Insight Venture Partners; VP of Products at eGain, a leading enterprise CRM software company; and co-founder and CTO of Sitebridge, which was acquired by eGain in 1999. Prior to Sitebridge, Prakash held technical roles at Goldman Sachs and Bell Communications Research. Prakash is an early investor in tech ventures, including Good Data, Transact Tools, and Facebook and has been a technology advisor to the Democratic National Committee. Prakash holds a BS from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute and an MS from Carnegie Mellon University.
